1.title: A Whore Is Born

episode of.title: The Whore of Wall Street (TV Mini-Series 2014– )

1.plot: Dani Daniels learns the secret to success in finance: get 'em by the balls, and don't let go.

2.title: The Anal Office Queen

episode of.title: The Whore of Wall Street (TV Mini-Series 2014– )

2.plot: Dani Daniels learned her first hard lesson about sex and the finance industry. It was a lesson she took to heart, and as the months went by, she never forgot what she learned that day: the way to a man's wallet is through his pants.

3.title: Bitch, You Work for Me!

episode of.title: The Whore of Wall Street (TV Mini-Series 2014– )

3.plot: On the third installment, it's trouble in paradise as Dani Daniels gets a rude awakening from her girlfriend Capri Cavanni, who's convinced she's being cheated on.

4.title: Double Teamed on the High Seas

episode of.title: The Whore of Wall Street (TV Mini-Series 2014– )

4.plot: Dani Daniels was just hanging out on her boat when a couple of federal agents showed up to ruin her good time. She tried everything from bribery to seduction to keep them off of her trail, but in the end, the pair was just too determined.

5.title: One Last Orgy

episode of.title: The Whore of Wall Street (TV Mini-Series 2014– )

5.plot: Dani Daniels is determined to have the most fun she can before she gets carted off to the slammer. Dani invites all of her hottest friends over to her place for a pool party, and wastes no time getting down to business.

imdb.plot outline: In the high-stakes world of Wall Street, sex is everything. Dani Daniels, a wildly wealthy girl learned that lesson her first day, at a meeting with Xander Corvus. He let her know that you've got to get off a whole lot if you want to deal with the stress of the finance industry. It was that day that Dani Daniels learned the secret to success in finance: get 'em by the balls, and don't let go. It was a lesson she took to heart, and as the months we by, she never forgot what she learned that day: the way to a man's wallet is through his pants. So now that Dani is an expert at getting laid and getting paid.
